name: Pokémon™ Alpha Sapphire
description:
In this game, the player is a Trainer
who captures, trains and battles small
creatures called Pokémon, while
adventuring to save the land from
Team Aqua’s evil plans. There is a
chance to become the Champion
Trainer by defeating other Trainers in
Pokémon battles, plus Super-Secret
Bases to find, and Secret Pals to
make, which can be accessed online
or over local wireless for multiplayer
battles and trading.
